current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide that in the case of leases to local education agencies and elementary and secondary
			 schools, consideration may be at or below fair market value or for no
			 consideration.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, is amended by adding at the end the following new
			 subsection:

header.#text:
Leasing of non-excess property of military departments and Defense Agencies; treatment of value
			 provided by local education agencies and elementary and secondary schools

text.#text:
In the case of a lease under this section to a local education
			 agency or an elementary or secondary
			 school (as those terms are
			 defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
), consideration may be at or below fair market value
			 or for no consideration.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 9101 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of
			 1965
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965/s:9101

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2936 IS: To provide that in the case of leases to local education agencies and elementary and secondary schools, consideration may be at or below fair market value or for no consideration.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
